editorialSummary.text: From May to October this docked Coast Guard lightship is home to a vibrant bar scene.

originalText.text: First off this place is a place to go for the views. The NYC views. It looks so beautiful when the sun is going down. There is a reservation spot up on the roof which can be romantic. Other than that its self serve. The lobster roll is one of the best ones I've had in NY so far. Chicken sandwich is a hit or miss. And the fish tacos are flavorful and not fishy. The helicopter tour is right next to it so you will be interrupted by helicopters landing and taking off

text.text: First off this place is a place to go for the views. The NYC views. It looks so beautiful when the sun is going down. There is a reservation spot up on the roof which can be romantic. Other than that its self serve. The lobster roll is one of the best ones I've had in NY so far. Chicken sandwich is a hit or miss. And the fish tacos are flavorful and not fishy. The helicopter tour is right next to it so you will be interrupted by helicopters landing and taking off

originalText.text: Nice restaurant that focuses on seafood. The bar are is also nice and lively. There are plenty of seating outside and standing by the bar. Great view of New York City and New Jersey . They have good oyster choices and the lobster roll is delicious. They offer other fried food that we didn‚Äôt try. Maybe next time

text.text: Nice restaurant that focuses on seafood. The bar are is also nice and lively. There are plenty of seating outside and standing by the bar. Great view of New York City and New Jersey . They have good oyster choices and the lobster roll is delicious. They offer other fried food that we didn‚Äôt try. Maybe next time

originalText.text: We had the boat to ourselves it seemed. The ambience was so pleasant we stayed for hours watching the sky darken, as night fell. You can buy beers from the pier and bring them on board. Everything about it was magical. The gentle movement of the vessel was calming too.

text.text: We had the boat to ourselves it seemed. The ambience was so pleasant we stayed for hours watching the sky darken, as night fell. You can buy beers from the pier and bring them on board. Everything about it was magical. The gentle movement of the vessel was calming too.

originalText.text: The food here has improved over the years. The place is still the top destination for waterfront bar experience!  I have to especially recognize how clean they've maintained the bathroom here, it's exceptional for being in the NYC bar scene and on a swinging barge!
